context: Churches exploring how AI tools can amplify ministry without losing the human element. Discipleship tech is a growing movement — using agents for sermon prep, prayer reminders, and community engagement.

items.author: @PastorTech
items.content: Used AI to generate small group discussion questions from Sunday's sermon. 30 minutes of prep became 5. The future of discipleship is hybrid.

items.author: Church Tech Today
items.content: How One Church Uses AI Agents for Follow-Up Care Without Losing the Personal Touch

items.author: Christianity Today
items.content: The rise of faith-tech: How churches are adopting AI responsibly for community building

items.author: Shepherd
items.content: Technology should serve the mission, not replace it. The best church tech is invisible — it frees pastors to do what they're called to do: shepherd people.
